title: _luxorum
description: Luxorum is a web application I developed to facilitate direct connections between customers and solar installers, providing streamlined communication and personalized quote generation.

title: _inegrity
description: A budgeting web app with a dashboard, developed in under 14 hours with two partners for the 2024 Fall BYUI Hackathon, winning second place.

title: _weather-analytics
description: This project provides detailed weather data analytics and visualizations for all Brigham Young University campuses. It features interactive graphs, charts, and metrics to help users analyze and interpret both historical and real-time weather data effectively.

title: _cs-math-notes
description: A Quarto website showcasing comprehensive notes from my bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a minor in Mathematics.
